effect_entries.effect: Held: Decreases the holder's Speed by 50%.  Whenever the holder gains Attack effort from battle, increases that effort by 4; this applies before the PokéRUS doubling effect.
effect_entries.short_effect: Held: Holder gains 4 Attack effort values, but has halved Speed in battle.

flavor_text_entries.text:
持たせると　素早さが　さがるが
ふつうよりも　ポケモンの　攻撃が
高く　育ちやすい。

An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It reduces Speed but allows the holder’s
Attack stat to grow more after battling.

Strumento da dare a un Pokémon.
Riduce la Velocità nella lotta ma permette ai punti
base dell’Attacco di crescere più rapidamente.

Tabla de piedra que potencia los movimientos de
tipo Volador. Debe llevarla un Pokémon.

Ein Item zum Tragen. Erhöht bei Levelaufstieg
den Angriffs-Wert, senkt aber die Initiative.

Objet à tenir. Permet à l’Attaque de progresser
plus vite, mais réduit la Vitesse pendant le
combat.

지니게 하면 스피드는 떨어지지만
여느 때보다 포켓몬의 공격을
올리면서 키우기가 쉽다.

もたせると　すばやさが　さがるが
ふつうよりも　ポケモンの　こうげきが
たかく　そだちやすい。

A Pokémon held item that promotes
Attack gain on leveling, but reduces
the Speed stat.

A Pokémon held item that promotes
Attack gain on leveling, but reduces
the Speed stat.

Objet à tenir augmentant l’Attaque
lors des montées de niveau, mais
réduisant la Vitesse pendant le combat.

A Pokémon held item that promotes
Attack gain on leveling, but reduces
the Speed stat.
